Constructors

DeepgramClient(string, Uri?, ILogger<DeepgramClient>?)

Creates a new DeepgramClient and connects to the Deepgram prerecorded API.

public DeepgramClient(string apiKey, Uri? baseUri = null, ILogger<DeepgramClient>? logger = null)

Parameters

apiKey string

The API key to use for requests.

baseUri Uri

The URI to use for requests. Overwrites the default Uri, PrerecordedUri.

logger ILogger<DeepgramClient>

The ILogger<TCategoryName> to use for logging.

Properties

BaseUri

The base URI to use for requests.

public Uri BaseUri { get; init; }

Uri

PreRecordedApi

The DeepgramPreRecordedApi to used for transcribing prerecorded audio.

public DeepgramPreRecordedApi PreRecordedApi { get; init; }

CreateLivestreamAsync(DeepgramLivestreamOptionCollection?, CancellationToken)

Creates a new DeepgramLivestreamApi and connects to the Deepgram livestream API.

public ValueTask<DeepgramLivestreamApi> CreateLivestreamAsync(DeepgramLivestreamOptionCollection? options = null, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

options DeepgramLivestreamOptionCollection

The options to use for the livestream.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to use for the request.

Returns

ValueTask<DeepgramLivestreamApi>

A DeepgramLivestreamApi connected to the Deepgram livestream API.
